description: Try our easy to follow Plum, Pecan & Chicken Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Plum, Pecan & Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the salad, toss together chicken with sliced plums and baby leaf salad mix. Drizzle with reserved dressing and sprinkle with caramelized pecans to serve.
